headline: Greenlight Capital Backs Henry Schein As Governance Shifts Target Margins
summary: Greenlight Capital has taken a new position in Henry Schein (NasdaqGS:HSIC). The investment thesis focuses on potential margin improvement and stronger free cash flow. Greenlight highlights operational changes tied to new activist board members. A pending CEO transition is expected to influence cost structure and e commerce priorities. Henry Schein, a major distributor of dental and medical products, sits at the intersection of healthcare services and digitizing supply chains. Investors...
